turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to figure out a charge on my bill. It's showing up as 'Premium Service' and I have no idea what that is!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. Can you please provide your account number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 1234567890. Honestly, I'm a bit frustrated. I've been a customer for years and this is the first time I've seen something like this.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I've located your account. Let me check on the 'Premium Service' charge. One moment... Okay, it appears this charge is for an add-on service you subscribed to on May 15th. It's a subscription for premium streaming content.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: May 15th? I don't remember signing up for anything like that. Is there any way to tell me exactly when and how I signed up? Like, what device was used, or the IP address?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. Unfortunately, that level of detail isn't readily available. Our records only show the date of the subscription. However, I can certainly cancel the subscription for you right away and issue a refund for the current month's charge. Would you like me to do that?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please. Cancel it and refund the charge. Thanks for your help, I appreciate it.
